paragraphs.text: IT is very curious to note how certain ideas are inherited from the earliest Fathers, and travel down, as here, to find a new expression in a distant age. Here our author reflects Justin Martyr,[fn-63-P6311_1930437:16-nf] and the Labarum[fn-63-P6312_1930491:17-nf] itself is the outcrop of what Justin wrote to Antoninus Pius.
